Promisiass
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Promisiass
By M.C.R. rockin metal masters on Wednesday, December 21, 2005 - 03:22 pm:

In the 2nd Promiass adventure how do you get past the 5th floor or where is the button to push.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, December 21, 2005 - 05:58 pm:

There's no set location, the game randomly changes everything around for each person on each venture.

By Apocalypse on Wednesday, December 21, 2005 - 06:32 pm:

The second time isn't the one with the ducken mini boss is it?

By M.C.R. rockin metal masters on Wednesday, December 21, 2005 - 06:45 pm:

Well all i know is that I pushed a button on the 1st or 2nd floor that showed a cut-scene with a big door opening and when I got to the 5th floor the door was shut and I couldn't find a button to push on the floor or go back.

By Anonymous on Thursday, December 22, 2005 - 12:12 pm:

Maybe the game gliched or something.

By Apocalypse on Thursday, December 22, 2005 - 01:10 pm:

When I went through Promiass I only hit one switch that opened one door on the first floor. Try rechecking the rooms or do the expedition over again. Chances are you missed a room or you need to wander into an empty room in order to continue. If you see a room that looks like an egyptian tomb walk into it and you should enter a mini-boss battle against a tutduck. (ducken/???)

By M.C.R. rockin metal masters on Thursday, December 22, 2005 - 04:28 pm:

Thanks Apocalypse I did what you said and redid the mission and found a toom with the kingtut ducken and passed the mission. Thanks again.

By Apocalypse on Thursday, December 22, 2005 - 05:01 pm:

Glad I could help.
